import React from 'react' import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik' import { http } from '../../axios' import * as yup from 'yup' function ProductEntry() { const initialValues = { product: "", mrp: "", qt: "", rate: "", gst: "", hsnno: "" } const submit = (values) => { http.post("product", values) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) console.log("Product Entry", values) } const validationSchema = yup.Object({ product: yup.string().required("Please Enter Product Name"), mrp: yup.number().required("Please Enter MRP"), qt: yup.number().required("Please Enter Quantity"), rate: yup.number().required("Please Enter Rate"), gst: yup.number().required("Please Enter GST"), hsnno: yup.number().required("Please Enter HSNNO") }) return (
) } export default ProductEntry
